title: Just a few more weeks until....
body: Bet you thought i was gonna say April first. Nah Nah Nah, only 219 more days till OPL Finials at Lunar Park. xD {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: REALLY!?!? Man if it is I'll get the tickets as soon as they comfort cause last year it was fast?!
can't tell if your being sarcastic or not. but yeah you can see here, http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/   they have the countdown running all year long

Not sure if sarcastic or not but that was 2015 and the countdown is now broken showing negative numbers :P
This year we are not going to Luna Park.

We are bringing OPL final to Brisbane: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/announcing-2016-opl-season
HOLY MOTHER YOU ARE!??!?!?! *skips around the room* Finally something in Brisbane!
yep im with you breh i wouldnt waste money going to a hole {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
